name: environment_scenario_troubleshoot_an_application_deployed_in_a_cyoda_en
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to troubleshoot an application deployed in a Cyoda environment by checking the logs.

parts.text: troubleshoot an application deployed in a Cyoda environment by checking the logs.

I can help — I’ll start by running check_environment_exists(env_name) before fetching logs.

Which environment and application should I check? Provide:
- Environment (e.g., `dev`, `staging`, `prod`)
- Application name (e.g., `my-calculator`)
- If this was a recent deployment, optionally provide the deployment start time (ISO) or say “recent” so I use a since_timestamp.

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App, List Environments, Cancel]
